title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 605.7 - Expense of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 605.7 - Expense of hearing

State Regulations

The expense of the investigation and of the hearing, if
held, will be certified by the commission under its official seal to the
applicant and shall be paid by the said applicant within 30 days thereafter, upon the certificate of the commission, to the persons entitled
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
605.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
